metadata.name: PUA - CleanWipe Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the use of CleanWipe a tool usually used to delete Symantec antivirus.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\sepremovaltoolnative_x64.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\catclean.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--uninstall')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\netinstaller.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-r')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\wfpunins.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/uninstall')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/enterprise'))))

output.summary: Detects the use of CleanWipe a tool usually used to delete Symantec antivirus.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administrative use (Should be investigated either way) Reference: https://github.com/3CORESec/MAL-CL/tree/master/Descriptors/Other/CleanWipe
